item.title: LeetCode 342. Power of Four 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 4 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of four or not.

item.title: LeetCode 804. Unique Morse Code Words 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 摩斯密碼對照表參照。Map char to integer then combine.

item.title: LeetCode 763. Partition Labels 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 將字串 s 分段，同一字母只能在一段中出現。Partition the string into as many parts as possible so that each letter appears in at most one part.

item.title: LeetCode 1356. Sort Integers by The Number of 1 Bits 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 依照 1 bits 出現的次數排序。

item.title: LeetCode 141. Linked List Cycle 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查這個 linked list 是否內含迴圈。Given head, the head of a linked list, determine if the linked list has a cycle in it.

item.title: LeetCode 217. Contains Duplicate 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查陣列中是否有出現重複的值。Return if any value appears at least twice in the array.

item.title: LeetCode 24. Swap Nodes in Pairs 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 將兩兩相鄰的 node 交換順序。Swap every two adjacent nodes.

item.title: LeetCode 53. Maximum Subarray 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 找出一個陣列中連續整數相加的最大值。Find the contiguous subarray which has the largest sum.

item.title: LeetCode 326. Power of Three 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 3 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of three or not.

item.title: LeetCode 350. Intersection of Two Arrays II 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查兩個 array 中相同的元素。Return elements must appear as many times as it shows in both arrays
